item.title: Unlocking Collaboration with Microsoft 365 Groups
item.description: Unlocking Collaboration with Microsoft 365 Groups Microsoft 365 Groups is a powerful collaboration tool that enables teams across your organization to work together more effectively. By creating a Microsoft 365 Group, you can provide a shared set of resources that team members can access and use to drive their projects forward. What are Microsoft 365 Groups? Microsoft 365 Groups is the foundational membership service that powers collaboration across the Microsoft 365 suite.
